txt_en: Happiness is not having what you want. It is wanting what you have.
txt_cn: 幸福不是拥有你想要的，而是珍惜你拥有的。

txt_en: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
txt_cn: 时间是我们最需要却最浪费的东西。

txt_en: In spring, every leaf is a flower in the making.
txt_cn: 在春天，每片叶子都是未来的花朵。

txt_en: Small steps every day lead to big results.
txt_cn: 每天迈出小步，终将收获大成果。

txt_en: Great things never come from comfort zones.
txt_cn: 伟大的成就从未源于舒适区。

txt_en: The shortest answer is doing the thing.
txt_cn: 行动是最直接的回应。

txt_en: Nothing will work unless you do.
txt_cn: 除非你去做，否则什么都不会发生。

txt_en: Years fly by, but the heart stays in the same place.
txt_cn: 时光飞逝，但我心依旧。

txt_en: Celebrate the new year together, welcoming and bidding farewell within one night.
txt_cn: 共欢新故岁，迎送一宵中。——李世民《守岁》

txt_en: Best wishes for the holidays and happiness throughout the New Year.
txt_cn: 恭贺新禧，万事如意。

txt_en: Home is where the heart is.
txt_cn: 此心安处是吾乡。

txt_en: All things in their being are good for something.
txt_cn: 天生我材必有用。

txt_en: Courage is like a muscle; it is strengthened by use.
txt_cn: 勇气就像肌肉，用得越多越强壮。

txt_en: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
txt_cn: 爱是你与一切之间的桥梁。

txt_en: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
txt_cn: 我宁愿死于激情也不愿死于无聊。

txt_en: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
txt_cn: 梦想，就是一种计划形式。

txt_en: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
txt_cn: 从昨天学习，为今天而活，对明天充满希望。

txt_en: Dreams don't work unless you do.
txt_cn: 梦想不会自己成真，除非你努力去实现。

txt_en: The best time to plant a tree was 10 years ago. The second best time is now.
txt_cn: 最好的种树时间是10年前，其次是现在。

txt_en: No pressure, no diamonds.
txt_cn: 没有压力，就没有钻石。

txt_en: Your only limit is your mind.
txt_cn: 唯一的限制是你的心态。

txt_en: Each day brings a new beginning.
txt_cn: 每天都是一个新开始。

txt_en: Love is what makes life worth living.
txt_cn: 爱，让生命有了意义。

txt_en: Happiness is homemade.
txt_cn: 幸福是自己创造的。

txt_en: Success is no accident.
txt_cn: 成功不是偶然的。

txt_en: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
txt_cn: 我们内在的成就会改变外在的现实。
